meanings.definition: The business of acting as a broker.
meanings.sent1: Many people work in brokerages to help others buy and sell stocks.
meanings.sent2: Investors often rely on brokerages to make trades in the stock market.
meanings.sent3: The brokerage office was so busy that the brokers had to take turns answering calls.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, brokerages are like the middlemen connecting buyers and sellers.
meanings.sent5: The brokerage industry plays a crucial role in facilitating financial transactions.
